name: Note
help: Add additional comment out of the main textual stream.

attributes.name: type
attributes.label: Type
attributes.message: Type of note

attributes.name: target
attributes.label: Target
attributes.message: , target id to be used if renvoi

attributes.name: text
attributes.label: Text
attributes.message: , and the actual text of the note

name: Brace
help: Vertical element used to show groupings of lines that function as a unit.

attributes.name: text
attributes.label: Text
attributes.message: Text to be associated with the lines

attributes.name: rend
attributes.label: Rend
attributes.message: , indication of how the brace is rendered on the page

attributes.name: target
attributes.label: Target
attributes.message: , and target id to be used to link the brace and the note (e.g. note_01)

name: Paraphrase
help: Wrap text that has been paraphrased

attributes.name: resp
attributes.label: Author
attributes.message: Person responsible for the paraphrased text

name: Highlight
help: Wrap a word or phrase to mark it as graphically distinct from the surrounding text.

attributes.name: type
attributes.label: Type
attributes.message: Type of abbreviation

name: Addition
help: Wrap text inserted in the source text

attributes.name: place
attributes.label: Place
attributes.message: Place where the addition is located with reference to the main text

name: Deletion
help: Wrap text deleted, marked as deleted, or otherwise indicated as superfluous.

attributes.name: rend
attributes.label: Rend
attributes.message: How the deletion is rendered on the page

attributes.name: lemma
attributes.label: Lemma
attributes.message: The lemma (i.e. non-elided version of the word)

attributes.name: join
attributes.label: Join
attributes.message: , or the side on which the word should be join another

name: Expansion
help: Wrap text that has been expanded from an abbreviation.

name: Hyphenation
help: Wrap a hyphen and indicate its type/function.

attributes.name: force
attributes.label: Force
attributes.message: Force of the association: strong for hyphen that should be preserved during tokenisation, weak for hyphen that should not be kept, e.g. split words at the end of lines

name: Omission/Gap
help: Mark a gap or omission in the transcription.

attributes.name: reason
attributes.label: Reason
attributes.message: Reason for the omission/gap, including type of content omitted

attributes.name: extent
attributes.label: Extent
attributes.message: , extent of the gap, e.g. 1 word, 3 paragraphs

name: Supplied
help: Wrap text supplied by the transcriber

attributes.name: reason
attributes.label: Reason
attributes.message: Reason why the text had to be supplied

name: Unclear
help: Wrap text that cannot be transcribed with certainty.

attributes.name: reason
attributes.label: Reason
attributes.message: Reason why the material is hard to transcribe

name: Blank space
help: Mark unusual space in the source text.

attributes.name: extent
attributes.label: Extent
attributes.message: Description of the extent of the blank, e.g. 7 words

name: Column
help: Mark the point at which a column of text begins.

attributes.name: n
attributes.label: Number
attributes.message: Number of the column on the page, e.g. 1, 2, etc

name: Named entity
help: Wrap text that refers to a person, place, room, etc.

attributes.name: type
attributes.label: Type
attributes.message: Type of entity

attributes.name: key
attributes.label: Key
attributes.message: , and key to an externally-defined means of identifying the entity, e.g. a database UUID

name: Leader
help: Typographical mark used to connect items on the page that might be separated by considerable horizontal distance.

attributes.name: rend
attributes.label: Rend
attributes.message: How the leader is rendered on the page
